title: Initiate Cancel Order
description: When the operation is complete, the order repository is updated as shown.

cancelOrder.description: Initiate Cancel information for the order.

taxPriceInfo.description: The tax pricing details for the order.

cityTax.description: The monetary amount of city tax.

amount.description: The monetary amount.

countyTax.description: The monetary amount of county tax.

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the amount is final.

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code.

countryTax.description: The monetary amount of country tax.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The tax amount in secondary currency

shippingGroups.description: Shipping groups represent shipments and include commerceItemRelationships that represent which commerce items in what quantity are included in the shipment. Shipping groups in a request are matched to existing shipping groups by id, followed by description, followed by (for hardgoodShippingGroups) shippingMethod + address.

description.description: The description of this shipping group. Defaults to the ID.

submittedDate.description: The date the shipping group was submitted.

priceInfo.description: The pricing details about this shipping group.

amount.description: The monetary amount.

rawShipping.description: The monetary amount of the cost of raw shipping.

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the amount is final.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this recurring charge.

total.description: The total price of the recurring charge.

subTotal.description: The sub-total price of the recurring charge.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts. A three character currency code such as USD.

totalWithoutTax.description: Total of recurring amount without tax included.

frequencyAmountTotals.description: The total for each recurring charge frequency

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's total e.g. Monthly.

total.description: The total amount for the frequency.

frequencyTaxTotals.description: The tax for each recurring charge frequency

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's tax e.g. Monthly.

tax.description: The tax amount for the frequency.

shipOnDate.description: The date this shipping group is expected to ship upon.

actualShipDate.description: The actual shipped date of this shipping group.

trackingInfo.description: An array that specifies the tracking info of shipping group. (read-only)

specialInstructions.description: Special instructions for the shipping group. Keys and values are strings.

shippingAddress.description: The shipping address for this shipping group.

ownerId.description: The ID of the owner of this address.

commerceItemRelationships.description: The commerce item relationships are instances of ShippingGroupCommerceItemRelationship that represent how many of which commerce items are included in the order. Please see caution in description of update order. Existing commerce items relationships are matched to input data by id, followed by commerceItemId, followed by commerceItemExternalId.

commerceItemId.description: The referenced commerce item's internal ID.

amount.description: The monetary value.

quantity.description: The quantity of items referenced by this relationship.

pointOfNoRevision.description: The boolean that indicates if the item has passed pointOfNoRevision.

relationshipType.description: The type of this relationship. SHIPPINGQUANTITY or SHIPPINGQUANTITYREMAINING.

returnedQuantity.description: Number of referenced items that were returned.

commerceItemExternalId.description: The referenced commerce item's external ID.

id.description: The native ID of this item.
The ID of this shipping group.

state.description: The state of this shipping group.

stateDetail.description: Details about the state of this shipping group.

trackingNumber.description: The tracking number. In case of multiple tracking numbers the format should be carrierId-trackingNumber,carrierId-trackingNumber..., Here carrierId is the Id which has been added through the addCarrier end point.

shippingGroupClassType.description: The class type for the ShippingGroup. Currently must be "hardgoodShippingGroup".

priceGroupId.description: The ID of the price group to which the order belongs.

secondaryCurrencyCode.description: The currency code of secondary currency.

exchangeRate.description: The conversion rate between the order currency and secondary currency.

taxExempt.description: Whether order is tax-exempt or not.

sourceSystem.description: The system where the order originated.

paymentGroups.description: The array of payment groups represent the payment(s) that paid for the order. Orders when placed will have an instance of a CyberSource TokenizedCreditCard (paymentGroupClassType and paymentMethod of "tokenizedCreditCard"). The paymentGroups property can be updated to include instances of ExternalPaymentGroup (paymentGroupClassType and paymentMethod of "externalPaymentGroup"). ExternalPaymentGroups represent methods of payment that are external and opaque to cloud commerce, and which were taken after the order was initially placed.

expirationYear.description: A string containing the two or four digit year when the credit card expires. (only for TokenizedCreditCards)

externalType.description: The type in the external system. Might be "StoreCredit", "CreditCard", "Check", etc. (only for ExternalPaymentGroups).

amount.description: The monetary amount of the payment.

externalId.description: The ID for the payment group in an external system (like the OMS)

creditCardType.description: The type of the credit card. (only for TokenizedCreditCards)

expirationMonth.description: A string containing the two digit month when the credit card expires. (only for TokenizedCreditCards)

submittedDate.description: The date the payment was submitted.

amount.description: The monetary amount.

token.description: The CyberSource token string. (only for tokenizedCreditCard)

paymentGroupClassType.description: The class type of the payment group. Currently supported values are "tokenizedCreditCard" and "externalPaymentGroup".

creditCardNumber.description: The last four digits of the credit card number. (only for TokenizedCreditCards)

IIN.description: The issuer identification number (first 6 digits) of the credit card.

externalSubtype.description: The subtype in the external system. Might be "VISA" for a PaymentGroup with an external type of "CreditCard". (only for ExternalPaymentGroups)

address1.description: Address line 1 for this billing address.

address2.description: Address line 2 for this billing address.

address3.description: Address line 3 for this billing address.

companyName.description: Company name for this billing address.

faxNumber.description: Fax Number for this billing address.

firstName.description: First Name for this billing address.

jobTitle.description: JOb Title for this billing address.

lastName.description: Last Name for this billing address.

middleName.description: Middle Name for this billing address.

phoneNumber.description: Phone Number for this billing address.

postalCode.description: Postal code for this billing address.

selectedState.description: The selected state of the shipping address.

state_ISOCode.description: The state ISON code of the shipping address.

selectedCountry.description: The selected country of the shipping address.

alias.description: Nickname or alternate name for address like home/office.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method. Currently supported values are "tokenizedCreditCard" and "externalPaymentGroup".

externalSourceId.description: The external source ID, limited to 6 characters. (only for ExternalPaymentGroups)

id.description: The internal ID of the payment group.

state.description: The state of this payment group.

stateDetail.description: Details about the state of this payment group.

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code. For example: USD.

expirationDayOfMonth.description: A string containing the two digit day of month when the credit card expires. (only for TokenizedCreditCards)

salesChannel.description: The sales channel of this order. default to "default".

shippingGroupCount.description: The number of shipping groups (read-only, value is ignored when updating).

locale.description: The locale in which order submitted.

paymentGroupCount.description: The number of payment groups. (read-only, value is ignored when updating)

priceInfo.description: Pricing information, an instance of OrderPriceInfo.

amount.description: The monetary amount.

total.description: The monetary total: amount + shipping + tax. (read-only)

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the amount is final.

manualAdjustmentTotal.description: The monetary total of manual adjustments.

discountAmount.description: The monetary amount of the discount: rawSubtotal - amount + manualAdjustmentTotal. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

recurringChargePriceInfo.description: Recurring charge price information of the order

amount.description: The monetary amount.

total.description: The monetary total: amount + shipping + tax. (read-only)

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the amount is final.

manualAdjustmentTotal.description: The monetary total of manual adjustments.

discountAmount.description: The monetary amount of the discount: rawSubtotal - amount + manualAdjustmentTotal. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

frequencyAmountTotals.description: The total for each recurring charge frequency

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's total e.g. Monthly.

total.description: The total amount for the frequency.

frequencyTaxTotals.description: The tax for each recurring charge frequency

frequency.description: The frequency for the item's tax e.g. Monthly.

tax.description: The tax amount for the frequency.

profileId.description: The ID of the shopper profile that owns the order.

siteId.description: The ID of the site on which the order was placed.

totalCommerceItemCount.description: The total count of commerce items in the order. (read-only)

pointOfNoRevision.description: The boolean that indicates if the item has passed pointOfNoRevision.

orderAction.description: The action performed on the order.

commerceItems.description: The commerce items (sometimes referred to as "line items") represent which actual skus are included in the order in what quantity, and related information. Please see caution in description of update order. Existing commerce items are matched to input data by externalId, followed by id, followed by catalogRefId. The elements in the commerceItem are instances of CommerceItemImpl.

quantity.description: The quantity included.

externalId.description: An optional, external ID for this commerce item.

externalData.description: External data to be associated with a commerce item, provided by a configurator system.

values.description: The array of values associated with an externalData item.

dynamic_property_key.description: This property's name and value will be retrieved from a configurator system, so will be dynamically set.

name.description: The name to be associated with the externalData item.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the externalData item by the configurator system.

activationDate.description: The activation date in ISO format.

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

customerAccountId.description: The customer account ID associated to the current item.

serviceId.description: The service ID associated to the current item.

assetKey.description: The assetKey is assigned only when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

rootAssetKey.description: The rootAssetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

parentAssetKey.description: The parentAssetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

asset.description: The flag that determines if the current item is an asset or not.

billingAccountId.description: The billing account ID associated to the current item.

serviceAccountId.description: The service account ID associated to the current item.

originalCommerceItemId.description: The Commerce Item ID associated with the original item from which item in cancel order is created.

catalogRefId.description: The reference ID of the catalog this commerce item references. Typically the SKU id.

configuratorId.description: Configuration id for the configurable commerce item.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this order.

priceListId.description: The price list ID used for pricing.

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the amount is final.

shippingSurcharge.description: Extra handling cost for shipping the product.

secondaryShippingSurcharge.description: Extra handling cost in secondary currency for shipping the product.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts. A three character currency code such as USD.

amount.description: The monetary amount.

quantity.description: The number of items covered by this price info

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the amount is final.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The tax amount in secondary currency

range.description: Represents which specific items are covered by this price info.

lowBound.description: The lower bound of the range this price info covers, inclusive.

highBound.description: The upper bound of the range this price info covers.

size.description: The number of items in this range, inclusive. (read-only)

detailedUnitPrice.description: The detailed unit price: amount / quantity. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

listPrice.description: The monetary amount of the list price.

discounted.description: Whether the recurring charge price is discounted.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this recurring charge.

rawTotalPrice.description: The raw total price of the recurring charge.

priceListId.description: The price list ID used for pricing.

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the recurring charge amount is final.

shippingSurcharge.description: Extra handling cost for shipping the product.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts. A three character currency code such as USD.

amount.description: The monetary amount for the recurring charge.

quantity.description: The number of items covered by this recurring charge price info

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the recurring charge amount is final.

range.description: Represents which specific items are covered by this recurring charge price info.

lowBound.description: The lower bound of the range this recurring charge price info covers, inclusive.

highBound.description: The upper bound of the range this recurring charge price info covers.

size.description: The number of items in this range, inclusive. (read-only)

detailedUnitPrice.description: The detailed unit price: amount / quantity. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

listPrice.description: The monetary amount of the list price.

externalRecurringChargeFrequency.description: The frequency for the recurring charge e.g. Monthly.

externalRecurringChargeDuration.description: The duration for the recurring charge e.g. 12 months.

catalogId.description: The ID of the catalog which this commerce item references.

catalogKey.description: The key of the catalog this commerce item references.

productDisplayName.description: The product's display name. (read-only, obtained from the referenced product)

externalPriceQuantity.description: External quantity of this commerce item

externalPrice.description: External price for this commerce item

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the item by the configurator system.

id.description: The internal/native ID for this commerce item.

state.description: The state of this commerce item. (read-only, calculated from shippingGroups' commerceItemRelationships)

stateDetail.description: Details about the state of this commerce item.

shopperInput.description: Map of shopper input keys to values

quantity.description: The quantity included.

catalogRefId.description: The reference ID of the catalog this commerce item references. Typically the SKU id.

configurationOptionId.description: ID of the catalog's configurationOption associated with this item.

quantity.description: The quantity included.

catalogRefId.description: The reference ID of the catalog this commerce item references. Typically the SKU id.

discounted.description: Whether the recurring charge price is discounted.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this recurring charge.

rawTotalPrice.description: The raw total price of the recurring charge.

priceListId.description: The price list ID used for pricing.

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the recurring charge amount is final.

shippingSurcharge.description: Extra handling cost for shipping the product.

currencyCode.description: The currency code for the monetary amounts. A three character currency code such as USD.

amount.description: The monetary amount for the recurring charge.

quantity.description: The number of items covered by this recurring charge price info

amountIsFinal.description: Whether the recurring charge amount is final.

range.description: Represents which specific items are covered by this recurring charge price info.

lowBound.description: The lower bound of the range this recurring charge price info covers, inclusive.

highBound.description: The upper bound of the range this recurring charge price info covers.

size.description: The number of items in this range, inclusive. (read-only)

detailedUnitPrice.description: The detailed unit price: amount / quantity. (read-only)

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code for the monetary amounts.

listPrice.description: The monetary amount of the list price.

externalRecurringChargeFrequency.description: The frequency for the recurring charge e.g. Monthly.

externalRecurringChargeDuration.description: The duration for the recurring charge e.g. 12 months.

externalData.description: External data to be associated with a commerce item, provided by a configurator system.

values.description: The array of values associated with an externalData item.

dynamic_property_key.description: This property's name and value will be retrieved from a configurator system, so will be dynamically set.

name.description: The name to be associated with the externalData item.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the externalData item by the configurator system.
The action code that has been set on the item by the configurator system.

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

serviceId.description: The service ID associated to the current item.

assetKey.description: The assetKey is assigned only when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

rootAssetKey.description: The rootAssetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

parentAssetKey.description: The parentAssetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

shopperInput.description: Map of shopper input keys to values

configurablePropertyId.description: ID of the catalog's configurableProperty associated with this item.

configurationOptionId.description: ID of the catalog's configurationOption associated with this item.

returnRequest.description: return request created for for the cancel order.

returnPaymentState.description: Return Payment State. It can be Refund, None or Due

login.description: Login id to be used.Defaults for email if not passed.

shippingAddress.description: The shipping address for this shipping group.

additionalProperties.description: Map of Additional properties for each return item

commerceItemId.description: Commerce Id of the returned item

catalogRefId.description: The reference ID of the catalog this return item references. Typically the SKU id.

shippingGroupId.description: Shipping group Id of the returned item

quantityShipped.description: Quantity of this item that was originally shipped

actualShippingRefundShare.description: Actual Shipping Refund at Item level

actualShippingSurchargeRefundShare.description: Actual Shipping Surcharge Refund at Item level

secondaryCurrencyActualShippingRefundSha.description: Actual shipping refund at return item level in secondary currency

secondaryCurrencyActualShippingSurcharge.description: Actual shipping surcharge refund at return item level in secondary currency

secondaryCurrencyActualTaxRefundShare.description: Actual Tax refund at return item level in secondary currency

actualTaxRefundShare.description: Actual Tax Refund at Item level

additionalProperties.description: Map of Additional properties for return request

trackingNumber.description: List of tracking numbers for the return request

state.description: State of the return request like PENDING_CUSTOMER_ACTION etc

orderCurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the order currency

returnFee.description: Return Fee for the return request

returnItemCount.description: Count of all the return items in the return request

unAdjustedRefundSubtotal.description: Refund SubTotal calculated as summation of unAdjustedRefundAmount for all return Items

suggestedShippingRefund.description: Suggested Shipping Refund of all Return Items

actualShippingRefund.description: Actual Shipping Refund at return request level

unallocatedAmount.description: The total refund amount that is not allocated to a refund method

suggestedTaxRefund.description: Suggested Tax Refund at return request level

shippingTaxRefund.description: Shipping Tax Refund at return request level

refundMethodList.description: List of Refund methods of return request

refundType.description: Type of the refund. For example this can be creditCard, tokenizedCreditCard	etc

amount.description: The amount pertaining to the refund method

maxRefundAmount.description: The maximum amount that can be refunded from the refund method

secondaryCurrencyCode.description: Secondary currency code in mix currency order

lastModifiedTime.description: Time at which order was last modified

sourceSystem.description: The system where the order originated.

submittedDate.description: Date on which the order was submitted.

paymentGroups.description: List of payment Groups for the order. Related Endpoint operations - submitOrder

PONumber.description: Purchase order number for invoice payment. Payment type: invoice

amountAuthorized.description: The amount authorized with this Payment Group.

amount.description: The amount associated with this Payment Group.

IIN.description: The issuer identification number (first 6 digits) of any IIN payment type card, e.g. credit card. This is normally used to allow any credit card type based promotions to be applied prior to final checkout.

token.description: Token associated with this Payment Group.

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code.

state.description: The payment state, it can be INCOMPLETE or COMPLETE

configuratorId.description: Configuration id of the configurable product

payTaxInSecondaryCurrencyCode.description: it is flag to enable loyalty point with monertry currency payment

amount.description: The raw number that represents the price.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The monetary total amount of  tax.

total.description: The current working total, including all promotions, tax, and billing costs.

rawSubtotal.description: The subtotal of the order before applying order-level promotions.

currencyCode.description: Indicates the currency of the price. For example, USD indicates that the price is in US dollars.

shipping.description: The shipping cost of the order.

exchangeRate.description: exchange rate of loyalty to monetry currency in case of mix currency order

totalCommerceItemCount.description: total number of commerce items in order

quantity.description: The quantity included.

amount.description: The monetary amount of this order.

currencyCode.description: Indicates the currency of the price. For example, USD indicates that the price is in US dollars.

catalogRefId.description: The reference ID of the catalog this commerce item references. Typically the SKU id.

taxPriceInfo.description: The tax pricing details for the order.

cityTax.description: The monetary amount of city tax.

currencyCode.description: The three character currency code.

amount.description: The monetary amount.

countyTax.description: The monetary amount of county tax.

isTaxIncluded.description: if tax is included in the price

shippingGroups.description: The shipping groups for the order.

amount.description: The total order amount.

currencyCode.description: The currency code.

secondaryCurrencyTaxAmount.description: The current  total tax amount in monetry currency
